name: Sprouts (BobaFrogStudios, VioletDes, unagidon, jessicanam, dananacon)
description:
Your time has come to take over the role of Sprout Farmer for your town. In other words, you have to farm babies. Raising babies is a huge responsibility and could have disastrous consequences. Before you officially take the position, you’ll have to prove your capabilities to your predecessor.

Each day you’ll be able to buy seeds, prepare your farm for obstacles such as weather to protect your crops, and sell babies to reach your goal. And you’ll do all of this while (hopefully) making active choices to raise babies with good characteristics.

Featuring randomly generated baby seeds and weather patterns, you’ll never know what to expect on the Sprouts Farm. Play today and test your ability to grow enough good babies on this existentially-cute and colorful farm!
